items.name: Doedre's Elixir
explicitMods: 281% increased Charges per use
Removes 80% of your maximum Energy Shield on use
You take 50% of your maximum Life as Chaos Damage on use
Gain 3 Endurance Charges on use
Gain 3 Frenzy Charges on use
Gain 3 Power Charges on use
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Doedre Darktongue knew the Way of the Thaumaturge.
In order to receive, one must give... without hesitation.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +22 to Intelligence
19% increased Lightning Damage
37% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
40% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 6% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Bottled Faith
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 29% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 9% increased Damage taken to Enemies
113% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will be triggered when you die. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
